text: Anata gata wa dōshite, arrā no michi no tame ni tatakawanai no ka. Mata yowai otoko ya on'na ya kodomo-tachi no tame ni mo. Kare-ra wa (inotte) iu. `Omo yo, kono fugi o nasu (makka no) jūmin no machi kara, watashi-tachi o sukuidashite kudasai. Soshite watashi-tachi ni, anata no omoto kara hitori no hogo-sha o tatete kudasa i. Mata watashi-tachi ni, anata no omoto kara hitori no enjo-sha o tatete kudasai
